text: regarding “using modules in templates”, ala <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/modules#using-modules-in-templates> - this seems to let you pass new default values into a module to be used. my use-case is I have a global module [navigation] which I want global so the nav is always the same on different pages [it uses a menu, but this way it’s edited in one place only] but want to pass a value through on specific pages. is this not possible?
